attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We campaign to see Real Football (using feet only, not hands or heads).  What is the point of having World Cup unless it is designed for cheats! Please bring back Real Football and sack the FIFA and other bodies for misconducts and rule breaking. France should be disqualified. Justice for World Football please.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
